page.title: 09School Sports Day
page.content: Annually in July,Sugar Hill School holds its Sports Day.July 15th.1985 was special because it was the first of the amalgamated school.At 11.00a.m. the preparations began,seating plans, track adjustment,equipment,tug-of-war heats, fete stalls and so on. The weather which had threatened rain, held perfectly for the 1.00 p.m. start.Although competition between the teams is fierce,fun is the important factor.Jumpers,hoppers,skippers and pupils in fancy dress competed in imaginiative novelty races as well as the pure sprints.Eventually the red team won for the second year running and received the cup fron a retiring teacher.Pupils teachers and parents rounded off an enjoyable afternoon at the fete,organised by parents and raising Â£400 for the School Fund.
